TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReadOnlySessionState implements class System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState

summary.span: 指定目标 HTTP 处理程序只需要具有对会话状态值的读访问权限。

span.span: Specifies that the target HTTP handler requires only read access to session-state values.

summary.span: 这是一个标记接口，没有任何方法。

span.span: This is a marker interface and has no methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现在自定义处理程序中来标识，您的处理程序只需要读取访问权限对会话状态值的接口。Implement the interface in your custom handler to identify that your handler requires only read access to session-state values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查当前 HTTP属性以确定它是否需要只读取访问会话状态的值。The following code example examines the current HTTP property to determine whether it requires only read access to session-state values. [!code-csharp[HttpSessionState#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/snippetscs.aspx#31)] [!code-vb[HttpSessionState#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#31)]
